classData.comment:
/**
 * @class Neo.tree.Accordion
 * @extends Neo.tree.List
 *
 * Accordion Store expects the following fields
 *
 *      [
 *          iconCls,        // can be defined in fields:icon
 *          content,        // can be defined in fields:text
 *          name,           // can be defined in fields:header
 *
 *          collapsed,      // collapsed state for non-leaf-items
 *          isLeaf,         // defines it item is leaf-item
 *          id,             // defines item id
 *          parentId        // leaf or sub-items need a parentId
 *      ]
 *
 */
classData.name: Accordion

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.tree.Accordion'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} ntype='treeaccordion'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: ntype
baseCls

classData.description: Define the field names for the store to show header, text and icon
classData.name: fields

classData.comment:
/**
         * Set to false to hide the initial root item
         * @member {Boolean} firstParentIsVisible=true
         */
classData.description: Set to false to hide the initial root item
classData.name: firstParentIsVisible

classData.comment:
/**
         * Set to false will auto expand root parent items and disallow collapsing
         * @member {Boolean} rootParentIsCollapsible=false
         */
classData.description: Set to false will auto expand root parent items and disallow collapsing
classData.name: rootParentIsCollapsible

classData.comment:
/**
         * Currently selected item, which is bindable
         * @member {Record[]|null} selection=null
         *
         * @example
         *     module: AccordionTree,
         *     bind  : {selection: {twoWay: true, value: data => data.selection}}
         *
         *     ntype: 'component',
         *     bind : {html: data => data.selection[0].name}
         */
classData.name: selection

classData.comment:
/**
         * Set to false will hide the icons for all leaf items
         * @member {Boolean} showIcon=true
         */
classData.description: Set to false will hide the icons for all leaf items
classData.name: showIcon
showCollapseExpandAllIcons
_vdom

classData.comment:
/**
     * Called when changing firstParentIsVisible
     * First store item gets marked and additional css class
     *
     * @param {Boolean} value
     * @param {Boolean} oldValue
     */
classData.description: Called when changing firstParentIsVisible First store item gets marked and additional css class
classData.name: afterSetFirstParentIsVisible

classData.comment:
/**
     * Called when changing rootParentsAreCollapsible
     * Ensures that root items are expanded if not collapsible
     *
     * @param {Boolean} value
     * @param {Boolean} oldValue
     */
classData.description: Called when changing rootParentsAreCollapsible Ensures that root items are expanded if not collapsible
classData.name: afterSetRootParentsAreCollapsible

classData.comment:
/**
     * Called when changing showIcon
     * Changes the display of the icons
     *
     * @param {Boolean} value
     * @param {Boolean} oldValue
     */
classData.description: Called when changing showIcon Changes the display of the icons
classData.name: afterSetShowIcon

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered before the selectionModel config gets changed.
     * @param {Neo.selection.Model} value
     * @param {Neo.selection.Model} oldValue
     * @returns {Neo.selection.Model}
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered before the selectionModel config gets changed.
classData.name: beforeSetSelectionModel

classData.comment:
/**
     * Remove all items from the accordion
     * If you do not need to update the view after clearing, set `withUpdate = false`
     *
     * @param {Boolean} [withUpdate=true]
     */
classData.description: Remove all items from the accordion If you do not need to update the view after clearing, set withUpdate = false
classData.name: clear
clearSelection

classData.comment:
/**
     * @param {String} [parentId] The parent node
     * @param {Object} [vdomRoot] The vdom template root for the current sub tree
     * @param {Number} level The hierarchy level of the tree
     * @returns {Object} vdomRoot
     * @protected
     */

params.description: The vdom template root for the current sub tree
params.name: vdomRoot

classData.name: createItems

classData.description: Expands an item based on the record
classData.name: expandItem

classData.comment:
/**
     * @param {Object} item

classData.name: onItemClick

classData.comment:
/**
             * The folderItemClick event fires when a click occurs on a list item which does have child items.
             * Passes the item record to the event handler.
             * @event folderItemClick
             * @returns {Object} record
             */
classData.description: The folderItemClick event fires when a click occurs on a list item which does have child items. Passes the item record to the event handler.

classData.description: To place the root item at the correct location
classData.name: getListItemsRoot

/**

classData.comment:
/**
     * Update a record

classData.comment:
/**
     * Set the selection either bei record id or record.
     * You can pass a record or a recordId as value

classData.description: Set the selection either bei record id or record. You can pass a record or a recordId as value
